title: Blended Learning Design for Strengthening Life Science Practitioners' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational life science theories and laboratory skills
context.additional_context: A long-term course for current elementary education practitioners to enhance life science practical competencies. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments in a BYOD environment, integrating online and offline activities via a blended learning model.

learning_goals: Perform at least two educational field problem-solving projects utilizing core life science concepts.
Participate in peer assessment and feedback activities on online learning platforms at a rate of 80% or higher.

In a blended learning environment (60% online lectures + 40% offline workshops), learners set three monthly learning goals, execute at least 10 hours of self-directed learning per week, and submit weekly learning journals (including goal attainment, time investment, reflections) achieving at least 80% implementation rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
